title: Opinion: Love, Life And Woman-Math Of A 31-Year-Old, Unmarried, Bengaluru Woman
content: I've met lawyers and designers and writers and artists and technology brothers, and couples and divorcees and singles and weirdos and non-weirdos and what I'm learning is this: there is no right way to live.
summary: I've met lawyers and designers and writers and artists and technology brothers, and couples and divorcees and singles and weirdos and non-weirdos and what I'm learning is this: there is no right way to live.

title: After Rail Network, Telecoms Installations Attacked In France Amid Olympics
content: Telecom installations belonging to French companies SFR and Bouygues Telecom have been vandalised, reported Le Parisien newspaper and BFM TV on Monday, citing unnamed sources.
summary: Telecom installations belonging to French companies SFR and Bouygues Telecom have been vandalised, reported Le Parisien newspaper and BFM TV on Monday, citing unnamed sources.

title: Kim Jong Un's Daughter Being Trained As Next North Korean Leader: Report
content: The daughter of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un was being trained to become the next leader, Yonhap news agency reported on Monday, citing South Korea's spy agency.
summary: The daughter of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un was being trained to become the next leader, Yonhap news agency reported on Monday, citing South Korea's spy agency.

title: Activist Arrested In French Rail Sabotage Case Before Olympic Games Opening
content: A far-left activist has been arrested in connection with the sabotage attack on France's high-speed rail network last Friday, Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin said on Monday.
summary: A far-left activist has been arrested in connection with the sabotage attack on France's high-speed rail network last Friday, Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin said on Monday.

title: 8-Week Vegan Diet Linked To Lower Biological Age, Study Finds
content: Going vegan for eight weeks was found to be linked to lowering of biological age, according to a study published in the journal BioMed Central (BMC) Medicine.
summary: Going vegan for eight weeks was found to be linked to lowering of biological age, according to a study published in the journal BioMed Central (BMC) Medicine.

title: Dutch Volleyball Player, Convicted Of Raping A Minor, Booed At Olympics
content: In 2016, Steven Van de Velde was sentenced to four years in prison after admitting to three counts of rape involving a 12-year-old British girl.
summary: In 2016, Steven Van de Velde was sentenced to four years in prison after admitting to three counts of rape involving a 12-year-old British girl.

title: France Train Services Resume 3 Days After Arson Attacks Disrupted Travel
content: The attacks affected 800,000 travellers, but "in the end, 700,000 were able to make their trips" while 100,000 were hit by train cancellations.
summary: The attacks affected 800,000 travellers, but "in the end, 700,000 were able to make their trips" while 100,000 were hit by train cancellations.

title: US Woman Rejected Man She Met On Dating App. He Killed Her The Next Day

title: In Loud Message To China, Quad Says No Country Should "Dominate" Others

title: "Crew Is Vomiting": United Airlines Flight Diverted Over "Biohazard" Scare
content: A United Airlines flight bound for Boston from Houston was forced to divert to Washington DC over a "biohazard" situation connected to a passenger that left crew members vomiting and other fliers onboard in distress.
summary: A United Airlines flight bound for Boston from Houston was forced to divert to Washington DC over a "biohazard" situation connected to a passenger that left crew members vomiting and other fliers onboard in distress.

title: Florida Man, Who Woke Up From 244-Day Coma, Killed By Pickup Truck
content: A 30-year-old Florida man, who miraculously survived a 244-day coma after a motorcycle crash years ago, was killed in another accident last week, reported WLTV News.
summary: A 30-year-old Florida man, who miraculously survived a 244-day coma after a motorcycle crash years ago, was killed in another accident last week, reported WLTV News.

title: Covid-19 Still Driving High Mortality Rate In This Country
content: Experts measured the number of people who had died as a direct or indirect result of Covid and found the excess mortality rate was still higher than pre-pandemic levels.
summary: Experts measured the number of people who had died as a direct or indirect result of Covid and found the excess mortality rate was still higher than pre-pandemic levels.

title: Venezuela President Nicolas Maduro Wins Reelection, Gets 51.2% Of Votes
content: Venezuela's President Nicolas Maduro won reelection with 51.2 per cent of votes cast Sunday, the electoral council announced, after a campaign tainted by claims of opposition intimidation and fears of fraud.
summary: Venezuela's President Nicolas Maduro won reelection with 51.2 per cent of votes cast Sunday, the electoral council announced, after a campaign tainted by claims of opposition intimidation and fears of fraud.

title: Journalist Slams Jennifer Aniston Amid JD Vance's "Childless Cat Ladies" Row
content: Megyn Kelly accused the actress of being hypocritical for not speaking out against gender ideology and transgender issues.

title: "I'm Right In 1,000% In For Her" :Salman Rushdie Supports Kamala Harris
content: Mumbai-born author Salman Rushdie has endorsed Kamala Harris's candidacy for the US presidency and said he believes she is the person who can prevent former president Donald Trump from dragging the country towards authoritarianism.
summary: Mumbai-born author Salman Rushdie has endorsed Kamala Harris's candidacy for the US presidency and said he believes she is the person who can prevent former president Donald Trump from dragging the country towards authoritarianism.

title: Elon Musk Claims Google Placed Search Ban On Donald Trump
content: Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk on Monday attacked Sundar Pichai-run Google, saying if the search giant is interfering with the US Presidential election, they are going to face "a lot of trouble".
summary: Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk on Monday attacked Sundar Pichai-run Google, saying if the search giant is interfering with the US Presidential election, they are going to face "a lot of trouble".

title: "She Got Crushed": Trump Defends Secret Service Agent Amid Criticism
content: Former US President Donald Trump has praised the woman Secret Service agent for protecting him during an assassination attempt on him at a Pennsylvania rally.

title: Israel, Hezbollah On Brink Of All-Out War After 12 Die In Rocket Strike
content: Israel attacked Hezbollah targets and threatened further retaliation for a rocket strike that resulted in the death of 12. But Israel has also signaled openness to a proposed Gaza truce that could also calm the combustible front with Lebanon.
summary: Israel attacked Hezbollah targets and threatened further retaliation for a rocket strike that resulted in the death of 12. But Israel has also signaled openness to a proposed Gaza truce that could also calm the combustible front with Lebanon.

title: 1 Killed, 6 Injured In Mass Shooting At Park In New York: Report
content: At least one person has been killed and six have been injured following a mass shooting at a park in New York's Rochester city today, according to local media.
summary: At least one person has been killed and six have been injured following a mass shooting at a park in New York's Rochester city today, according to local media.
